# mw-radio

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                               | Type                                      | Default              |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `checked`       | `checked`        | Whether the radio button is checked                                       | `boolean`                                 | `false`              |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | Visually and functionally disable radio button                            | `boolean`                                 | `undefined`          |
| `label`         | `label`          | Label to be displayed                                                     | `string`                                  | `undefined`          |
| `labelPosition` | `label-position` | Dictates on which side of checkbox the label is placed                    | `PositionEnum.LEFT \| PositionEnum.RIGHT` | `PositionEnum.RIGHT` |
| `name`          | `name`           | Analog to HTML 'name' attribute used to group radios for unique selection | `string`                                  | `undefined`          |
| `testId`        | `test-id`        | Should be provided for automated testing                                  | `string`                                  | `undefined`          |
| `value`         | `value`          | Value of the radio button                                                 | `string`                                  | `undefined`          |
